Quickstrike:








Quickstrike listened, still a little dazed from his damage. He already knew 
Tarantsulus was dead, but he didn't want to say much. He wanted to save his 
energy. "Sure," he said, agreeing to the debt. "Ah jus' needs t' gets some 
repair an' food if ya can. Dyin' over here." He was littery right.
